languages.text: "Купальня порою опаснее поля битвы! Здесь можно поскользнуться на мокрой плитке, захлебнуться, перегреться, переостудиться, поперхнуться, бывали даже случаи, когда духи машин гневались и пускали свои яростные искры в воду. И это не говоря о покушениях и..."

"This bathchamber can be more dangerous than a battlefield sometimes! You can slip on a wet tile, you can choke and drown... If the water is too hot, you can burn yourself, and if it's too cold, you can freeze... There have even been cases where angry machine spirits have released sparks of their fury in the water. And of course, there have been numerous assassination attempts and—"
languages.original_text: "Купальня порою опаснее поля битвы! Здесь можно поскользнуться на мокрой плитке, захлебнуться, перегреться, переостудиться, поперхнуться, бывали даже случаи, когда духи машин гневались и пускали свои яростные искры в воду. И это не говоря о покушениях и..."

traits.locale_text: "This bathchamber can be more dangerous than a battlefield sometimes! You can slip on a wet tile, you can choke and drown... If the water is too hot, you can burn yourself, and if it's too cold, you can freeze... There have even been cases where angry machine spirits have released sparks of their fury in the water. And of course, there have been numerous assassination attempts and—"
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

If the water is too hot, you can burn yourself, and if it's too cold, you can freeze... There have even been cases where angry machine spirits have released sparks of their fury in the water. And of course, there have been numerous assassination attempts and—"

If the water is too hot, you can burn yourself, and if it's too cold, you can freeze... There have even been cases where angry machine spirits have released a discharge of the Motive Force in the water. And of course, there have been numerous assassination attempts and—"

And of course, there have been numerous assassination attempts and—"

traits.locale_text: "This bathchamber can be more dangerous than a battlefield sometimes! You can slip on a wet tile, you can choke and drown... If the water is too hot, you can burn yourself, and if it's too cold, you can freeze... There have even been cases where angry machine spirits have released sparks of their fury in the water. And of course, there have been numerous assassination attempts and—"
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: « Tant de dangers vous guettent dans cette salle de bain, peut-être même plus que sur un champ de bataille ! Vous pourriez glisser sur un carreau mouillé, vous étouffer et vous noyer... Si l'eau est trop chaude, vous risquez de vous brûler ou, au contraire, de geler si elle est trop froide... Il est même arrivé que des esprits de la machine en colère déversent dans l'eau des étincelles de colère. Et je ne parle même pas des nombreuses tentatives d'assassinat ainsi que... »
languages.original_text: "This bathchamber can be more dangerous than a battlefield sometimes! You can slip on a wet tile, you can choke and drown... If the water is too hot, you can burn yourself, and if it's too cold, you can freeze... There have even been cases where angry machine spirits have released sparks of their fury in the water. And of course, there have been numerous assassination attempts and—"

traits.locale_text: « Tant de dangers vous guettent dans cette salle de bain, peut-être même plus que dans le Warp ! Vous pourriez glisser sur un carreau mouillé, vous étouffer et vous noyer... Si l'eau est trop chaude, vous risquez de vous brûler ou, au contraire, de geler si elle est trop froide... Il est même arrivé que des esprits de la machine en colère déchargent la Force Motrice dans l'eau. Et je ne parle même pas des nombreuses tentatives d'assassinat ainsi que... »
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: «¡Esta cámara de baño puede llegar a ser más peligrosa que el campo de batalla! Puede resbalarse con una baldosa húmeda, puede atragantarse o ahogarse... Si el agua está demasiado caliente, puede quemarse, y, si está demasiado fría, puede congelarse... Incluso se han dado casos en los que espíritus máquina enfadados han descargado chispas de su furia en el agua. Por supuesto, también se han producido numerosos intentos de asesinato y...».
languages.original_text: "This bathchamber can be more dangerous than a battlefield sometimes! You can slip on a wet tile, you can choke and drown... If the water is too hot, you can burn yourself, and if it's too cold, you can freeze... There have even been cases where angry machine spirits have released sparks of their fury in the water. And of course, there have been numerous assassination attempts and—"

traits.locale_text: «¡Esta cámara de baño puede llegar a ser más peligrosa que la disformidad! Puede resbalarse con una baldosa húmeda, puede atragantarse o ahogarse... Si el agua está demasiado caliente, puede quemarse, y, si está demasiado fría, puede congelarse... Incluso se han dado casos en los que espíritus máquina enfadados han desatado descargas de Fuerza Motriz en el agua. Por supuesto, también se han producido numerosos intentos de asesinato y...».
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: “有时候浴室可能会比战场还要危险！比如，您可能会在沾水的瓷砖上滑倒，可能会不小心溺水……如果水太热的话，您可能会烫到；如果水太凉，您可能会冻僵……甚至有的时候，恼怒的机魂可能会将它愤怒的火花释放在水里。当然，有时还会有刺客——”
languages.original_text: "This bathchamber can be more dangerous than a battlefield sometimes! You can slip on a wet tile, you can choke and drown... If the water is too hot, you can burn yourself, and if it's too cold, you can freeze... There have even been cases where angry machine spirits have released sparks of their fury in the water. And of course, there have been numerous assassination attempts and—"

traits.locale_text: “有的时候，浴室可能会比亚空间还要危险！比如，您可能会在沾水的瓷砖上滑倒，可能会不小心溺水……如果水太热的话，您可能会烫到，如果水太凉，您可能会冻僵……甚至有的时候，愤怒的机魂可能会将一部分源力释放在水中。当然，有时还会有刺客——”
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: 「この風呂場は、時には<歪み>よりも危険なことがある！濡れたタイルの上で滑ったり、窒息して溺れたり…お湯が熱すぎれば火傷するし、冷たすぎれば凍る…怒った機械精霊が水中でその怒りの火花を放出したケースさえある。もちろん、暗殺未遂事件も数多く起きている…」
languages.original_text: "This bathchamber can be more dangerous than a battlefield sometimes! You can slip on a wet tile, you can choke and drown... If the water is too hot, you can burn yourself, and if it's too cold, you can freeze... There have even been cases where angry machine spirits have released sparks of their fury in the water. And of course, there have been numerous assassination attempts and—"

traits.locale_text: 「この風呂場は、時には<歪み>よりも危険なことがある！濡れたタイルの上で滑ったり、窒息して溺れたり…お湯が熱すぎれば火傷するし、冷たすぎれば凍る…怒った機械精霊が水中で動力を放出したケースさえある。もちろん、暗殺未遂事件も数多く起きている…」
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: "Dieses Bad ist mitunter gefährlicher als das Schlachtfeld! Man kann auf einer nassen Fliese ausrutschen, man kann sich verschlucken und ertrinken ... Wenn das Wasser zu heiß ist, kann man Verbrennungen erleiden, und wenn es zu kalt ist, kann man erfrieren ... Es ist sogar schon vorgekommen, dass zornige Maschinengeister Funken ihres Zorns ins Wasser entladen haben. Und natürlich gab es zahlreiche Attentatsversuche und ..."
languages.original_text: "This bathchamber can be more dangerous than a battlefield sometimes! You can slip on a wet tile, you can choke and drown... If the water is too hot, you can burn yourself, and if it's too cold, you can freeze... There have even been cases where angry machine spirits have released sparks of their fury in the water. And of course, there have been numerous assassination attempts and—"

traits.locale_text: "Dieses Badegemach kann manchmal gefährlicher sein als der Warp! Man kann auf einer nassen Fliese ausrutschen, man kann sich verschlucken und ertrinken ... Wenn das Wasser zu heiß ist, kann man Verbrennungen erleiden, und wenn es zu kalt ist, kann man erfrieren ... Es ist sogar schon vorgekommen, dass zornige Maschinengeister Antriebskraft ins Wasser entladen haben. Und natürlich gab es zahlreiche Attentatsversuche und -"
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: "Hamam bazen bir savaş alanından daha tehlikeli olabilir! Islak bir karoya basabilirsiniz, boğazınıza bir şey kaçabilir, boğulabilirsiniz... Su fazla sıcaksa kendinizi yakabilir, fazla soğuksa donabilirsiniz... Öfkeli makine ruhlarının suya öfke dolu kıvılcımlarını saldığı zamanlar dahi oldu. Bir de sayısız suikast girişimi ve..."
languages.original_text: "This bathchamber can be more dangerous than a battlefield sometimes! You can slip on a wet tile, you can choke and drown... If the water is too hot, you can burn yourself, and if it's too cold, you can freeze... There have even been cases where angry machine spirits have released sparks of their fury in the water. And of course, there have been numerous assassination attempts and—"
